ActJudges Act
SubjectTheresa Sarchuk ** ANNUITY ** The Hon. Alexander A. Sarchuk **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to THERESA SARCHUK, survivor of the Hon. Alexander A. Sarchuk, a Judge of the Tax Court of Canada, effective February 19, 2015.
